description:
Our goal at Certa Farrish Law Group is to help injured people put their lives back together. We investigate accidents, negotiate with insurance companies and take cases to trial, if necessary.

We believe a personal injury law firm should put its clients first. We prioritize communication, compassion, knowledge and tenacity in everything we do.

A Range Of Injuries

Most injuries are costlier than people imagine at first. We help people get the compensation they need to keep up with the high price of recovery in the Seattle, Washington, area.

Our law firm handles cases involving serious injuries, such as those arising from car, bus, motorcycle and other roadway accidents; and severe disfigurement or disability, such as from dog bites, burns and brain injuries. We also represent individuals against large, powerful corporations, such as in premises (slip-and-fall) cases against grocery chains, medical malpractice suits against hospitals and commercial vehicle claims involving multiple companies.

A Focused Practice

Organization, knowledge and communication are our primary tools in complex personal injury cases. We approach each case with individualized analysis and strategy, up to and including planning for trial. Our sole focus is the pursuit of maximum compensation for our clients.

An Open Door

Certa Farrish Law Group is available throughout Seattle for immediate assistance with all types of personal injury cases. Our law firm offers a free initial consultation to new clients, virtually if necessary.
